data.description: The Chandler is a three story four bedroom four bath home with an attached oversized one car garage and a lower level bonus room with a full bath. The second level features a spacious family room kitchen with island and a bedroom with a full bath plus two balconies. The third level features three bedrooms including the owner 39 s suite an additional hall bath and a laundry area.
